subject: Remove technical jargon from tutorial 'What's Different' step
body:
Simplified the tutorial by removing implementation details that users don't need to know:
- Removed "Database-driven push notifications (no client coordination)" technical description
- Removed vague "Focus on quality over quantity" statement

The step now focuses only on concrete, user-facing features that differentiate SyncTone.
title: Remove technical jargon from tutorial 'What's Different' step
